sentences.sContent: The baby might easily grow up into the person just like his father, misbehavior, testiness and bellicosity.
sentences.sContent_eng: The baby might easily grow up into the person just like his father, misbehavior, testiness and bellicosity.
sentences.sCn: 那个婴儿很容易长大后变成他父亲那样的人，品行不端，易怒和好斗。

sentences.sContent: A group of "misbehavior" with the dream of the University Teachers' education, from the city to the remote village opened a school.
sentences.sContent_eng: A group of "misbehavior" with the dream of the University Teachers' education, from the city to the remote village opened a school.
sentences.sCn: 一群“品行不端”却怀揣教育梦想的大学教师，从大城市来到偏远乡村开办了一所学校。

remMethod.val: mis (坏) + behavior (行为) → 品行不端

words.tran: 不正当举止；行为无礼貌
使举止失礼；使行为不端
